introduction: Hyeon-ho is studying for the delivery of newspapers, while Gang-il works part-time in cabarets to raise school funds. Gang - il meets Nam - hee there, and a triangle is formed between her and the two men. In the end, Gangil brings Hyeon-ho and Nam-hee close together and the two people live together. One day, after hearing the tragedy of Nam Hee, he tries to assault Nam Hee, and Gang Il and Hyun hurt him. Gangil embroidered for Hyun Ho and Nam Hee, but he felt guilty for his conscience. He died of cardiac disease, a chronic illness during his imprisonment, and Gang - il promised a new start to Nanhee, but she left without any answer.
